title: Horsham's Op Shop Ladies
creator_credit: Roberto Salvatore, Jessica Scott and ACMI
brief_description: Meet the women who volunteer their time to run Horsham’s Op Shops, located in western Victoria. These ladies have been providing years of entertainment and bargains to both locals and visitors, embodying the community spirit of Horsham.
description: Meet the women who volunteer their time to run Horsham’s Op Shops, located in western Victoria. These ladies have been providing years of entertainment and bargains to both locals and visitors, embodying the community spirit of Horsham.
